The constraint `['room type:private room']` was removed by replacing the specific request ("we would appreciate private rooms") with a more open-ended statement ("we are open to various options"). This allows the planner to suggest different accommodation types (e.g., shared rooms, hostels, or unique stays) without violating the original constraint. The rest of the query remains unchanged.
